metadata.title: CVE-2019-14498 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: A divide-by-zero error exists in the Control function of demux/caf.c in VideoLAN VLC media player 3.0.7.1. As a result, an FPE can be triggered via a crafted CAF file.

advisory.discovered_by: Antonio Morales from the Semmle Security Team

criterions.comment: vlc package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.0.8-2').
